sprint_goal: Establish the cloud foundation, security baseline, and audit logging infrastructure.
key_deliverables: AKS Cluster with RBAC; Geo-redundant DB; Audit Log Service
demo_objectives: Show Terraform apply pipeline; Demonstrate DB connectivity; Verify audit log ingestion
success_criteria: Infrastructure up; Security scans pass; Audit consumer operational
risk_factors: Azure quota limits; Security compliance delays
mitigation_strategies: Request quotas early; Pre-scan IaC code

sprint_goal: Deliver core backend logic for products and routing, and enable admin configuration UI.
key_deliverables: Routing Service API; OCR Worker; Map Editor UI
demo_objectives: Route a request via API; Upload invoice and see OCR; Draw polygon on map
success_criteria: Routing accuracy > 99%; OCR latency < 5s; Map UI functional
mitigation_strategies: Early load testing for PostGIS; Fallback for OCR
external_dependencies: Mapbox API Keys; Azure AI Keys

sprint_goal: Focus on mobile technician capabilities including real-time tracking and offline resilience.
key_deliverables: Technician App Background Tracking; Offline Sync Engine
demo_objectives: Track technician in background; Create job offline and sync when online
success_criteria: Battery drain < 15%/hr; Zero data loss on sync
risk_factors: iOS background permissions; Offline data conflicts
mitigation_strategies: Early TestFlight builds; Rigid conflict resolution rules
